title: Assessment of secondary metabolites in Pennisetum purpureum planted into constructed wetlands using shale and laterite as substrate for wastewater treatment
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Nadège Fatim Traoré, Jean-Marie Pétémanagnan Ouattara, Franck Michaël Zahui, Amichalé Jean Cyrille Beda, Aman Messou
